keywords.value: Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: A group of OPEC and non-OPEC oil producers have joined forces to reduce the daily amount of oil on sale by 1.8 million barrels in the first six months of this year.
snippet: A group of OPEC and non-OPEC oil producers have joined forces to reduce the daily amount of oil on sale by 1.8 million barrels in the first six months of this year....

headline.main: Oil Producers Claim Progress in Curbing the World’s Daily Supply
headline.print_headline: Oil Producers Note Progress in Reducing Daily Supply
